titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 150th anniversary of the Battle of Gettysburg and the significance of this battle in the history of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/27/2013--Introduced. Recognizes the 150th anniversary of the Battle of Gettysburg and the historical significance of the outcome, which helped to preserve the United States.
